name: Pixel Invaders
description:
If one of these files doesn't work. Try the other :)

This is an early version of Pixels in Space which will be released to the google play store and the app store soon. 

Instructions 

Tap and hold on your screen and your ship will follow your finger and shoot automatically. You do not need to lift your finger off the screen. 

When your energy bar is full you can shoot the laser by lifting your finger off the screen. Lasers pierce shields.

There are various powerups that you can fly into to activate.

Sorry for the lack of in-game tutorial, it is coming soon :) Thanks for testing my game. Please leave any feedback in the comments section so I can improve it
